news.title: Twitch is overhauling its suspensions policy
news.summary: The company is implementing two suspension types: streaming suspensions and chatting suspensions.

news.title: Stripe’s valuation soars 74% to $159 billion
news.summary: Stripe has conducted another tender offer, where employees sell shares. Investors include Thrive Capital, Coatue, a16z, and Stripe itself

news.title: YouTube beefs up its $7.99/month Lite subscription with offline downloads and background play
news.summary: Now the only reason to get the full Premium subscription is ad-free music and music videos.

news.title: Music generator ProducerAI joins Google Labs
news.summary: Wyclef Jean used Google's AI music tools on his new song "Back in Abu Dhabi."

news.title: 1Password is going up in price
news.summary: 1Password is increasing its prices on March 27th, 2026. In an email sent to users, the password manager says it will raise the price of its yearly individual plan from $35.88 to $47.88, and that its family plan is going from $59.88 to $71.88. news.title: PlayStation’s Wolverine game hits PS5 in September
news.summary: Marvel's Wolverine, the next superhero game from Marvel's Spider-Man developer Insomniac Games, will be released on PS5 on September 15th. news.title: 50 mpg in a Nissan crossover? Testing the new E-Power hybrid system.
news.summary: Nissan imported some Qashqais from Europe so we could sample the hybrid system.

news.title: Lamborghini cancels electric Lanzador as supercar buyers reject EVs
news.summary: Investing heavily in battery EVs would be "financially irresponsible," CEO said.

news.title: Meta could end up owning 10% of AMD in new chip deal
news.summary: AMD will supply 6 gigawatts' worth of chips to buttress Meta's AI efforts.

news.title: Scientists crack the case of "screeching" Scotch tape
news.summary: Micro-cracks travel along the peeling tape at supersonic speeds, producing shock waves and sound pulses.

news.title: Life in Cuba Under Trump's Pressure Campaign: No Electricity, No Oil, and Impossible Choices
news.summary: As the United States takes new steps against the regime that has ruled the island since 1959, the Cuban people face 20-hour blackouts, decreased internet access, and shortages of basic supplies.

news.title: The Last Mystery of Antarctica’s ‘Blood Falls’ Has Finally Been Solved
news.summary: New research sheds light on what drives reddish water to emerge from underground to pour onto the Taylor Glacier.

news.title: Tide’s Evo Tiles Are a Fresh, Overengineered Take on the Tide Pod
news.summary: Tide’s Evo Tiles are lightweight, fibrous squares of detergent that simplify the laundry process—and also act as a slightly more eco-friendly alternative to the Tide Pod.

news.title: 6 Best 2-in-1 Laptops (2026), WIRED-Approved and Tested
news.summary: These 2-in-1 computers upgrade the norm with touchscreen displays, 360-degree hinges, and detachable keyboards.

news.title: Fellow Series 1 Espresso Machine Review (2026): Excellent, but a Work in Progress
news.summary: Fellow’s new espresso machine offers capabilities previously seen only in commercial machines. Some of those are still being fleshed out.
